review_body: We have been there with my wife and it was an amazing experience.Service is top noch, rooms are great. Of course, it comes with a price but in the end, it so great that you forget this detail.Restaurant is fantastic and we highly recommend this place.

Wa hed a very good stay in this hotel. The location is perfect, just in front central park. The breakfast in room was very very good, large choice of everything. The indoor pool is great, 20 meters long, and the gym had everything needed.The room was lovely and very nice view.

I generally like the mandarin chain but the New York property really needs to upgrade the rooms, bathroom and the in room entertainment system. All outdated but the price hasnâ€™t changed. Quite tricky as far as benefits are concerned, we had a $300 credit but they quite conveniently forgot to mention that the main bar will not extend any credit given by the hotel what a sham. We stayed for four nights and thought we were using our credits but at checkout found that only $32 was used from our $300. Shameful form a five star establishment. We were booked to come back again on March 07 but we cancelled. Will avoid this particular property of Mandarin.
